# Book-Verse : Discover, Read, and Engage with Your Digital Books on the ICP Ecosystem. üöÄ

## üì¶ Installation Requirement

## üìù Guide to Run Book-Verse
1. Open **Visual Studio Code**
2. Open terminal on **Visual Studio Code**
3. Run on terminal this script : **git clone https://github.com/yebology/bookverse-dapp.git**
4. Run on terminal this script : **npm install**
5. Create **.env** file
6. Add this on **.env** file
   VITE_GATEWAY=blue-junior-haddock-445.mypinata.cloud
VITE_JWT=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..c1UCJINZ9ojVayxUagpyrItPzeEiS6Bas4s-nuF5JKQ  
8. Run on terminal : **npm run dev**
9. Enjoy use our platform!

## ‚öôÔ∏è Tech Stack Behind Book-Verse :
- üñ•Ô∏è Frontend : ReactJS (Javascript)
- üîß Canister Development : Motoko
- üîë Authentication : Internet Identity
- üß© Component Library : Aceternity UI
- üåê IPFS Provider : Pinata
- üé® Styling : TailwindCSS
